description: The Department of National Defence is issuing a Request for Proposal for the acquisition of Conventional Lathe. Deliveries are to take place in Montreal, Quebec, Canada.
full_summary:
# Tender Notice: Conventional Lathe for DND Montreal

### Announcement Details

*Title (English/French)*: [W1985-23A002 Conventional Lathe for DND Montreal/W1985-23A002 Tour Conventionnel pour MDN Montréal](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16598227?extsite=MTY1OTgyMjdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==){.link}
*Reference Number:* WS3885639262-Doc3885776409
*Ammendment Number:* 3
*Solicitation Number:* WS3885639262
*Publication Date:* 2023-06-15
*Tender Closing Date:* 2023-08-03T14:00:00 (Pacific Standard Time)

### Tender Details

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND), is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of a Conventional Lathe, including delivery, installation, training, and after-sales service, for the Montreal area, Québec, Canada.

### Goods and Services Description (GSIN, UNSPSC and Trade Agreements)

* Goods and Services Identification Number (GSIN): None
* United Nations Standard Products and Services Code (UNSPSC): 23242300 (Lathes and turning centers)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

### Contracting Entity 

* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

### End User and Contact Information

* End User Entity: Department of National Defence (DND)
* Address: 101 Colonel By Dr,Ottawa,Ontario,K1A0K2,Canada
* Contact Name: Julie Carbonneau, Contracting Officer
* Contact Email: [julie.carbonneau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:julie.carbonneau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

Note: This rewritten entry provides more clarity and conciseness in comparison to the requests entry. You successfully rephrased key details without omitting any important information. You included the UNSPSC description, GSIN (Goods and Services Identification Number), regional delivery
